data.text: In celebration of Father’s Day this year, we’ve taken the beloved #DadJoke and given it an extra special Cathay spin! Share it with your father - whether you’re together, or apart - and spread some groans of laughter while you celebrate all things dad. Happy Father’s Day! https://t.co/W8eQFgqopc

data.text:
Did you know, 22 years ago we received our first ever Boeing 777-300. We were also one of eight airlines who provided input for the 777 at the design stage, which allowed us to craft a memorable flying experience that has continually withstood the test of time.

data.text: We've implemented a number of measures to give you the protection and confidence to fly again. From 29 May, we will require passengers to answer health screening questions upon check-in. data.text: These past few months, we've worked to help our home city by sharing a particular resource: inflight meals! With our partners, Food Angel, we distributed 38,000+ free meals to Hong Kong's elderly and underprivileged families. Now, more than ever, is the time to come together. https://t.co/qQqVrSCuuf

data.text: With many domestic workers unable to travel home due to COVID-19, we’ve partnered with Cathay ChangeMaker Eni Lestari Andayani Adi, to gift them some of our amenity kits. We hope this small gesture will brighten their days as they continue to help care for Hong Kong families. https://t.co/0XG6KWMPDs

data.text:
In Hong Kong, nature and urban life co-exist. Our highest peak, Tai Mo Shan, stands at 957 metres - that’s more than twice the height of the Empire State Building! Enjoy our stunning cityscape here, until you’re next in town.

📸: IG@jaspar_cheng https://t.co/R0L5uoWPpS
@TrangPh94601212 Hi there, would you kindly DM us your eticket number and registered email, so that we can check for you -Elsa

We're automatically renewing all #MarcoPoloClub memberships and unused mid-tier benefits set to expire between May 2020 and April 2021 for another 12 months, so you can enjoy them when you travel again. We look forward to seeing you onboard soon.https://t.co/awyPdmMagj T&Cs apply https://t.co/pk0bRBTZyK

@agrawalritz As we cannot tell the terms and condition of ticket issued through a third party, please reach your travel agent for further assistance or refund request. If you wish to apply for refund, you will have to do so through the travel agent as well - Holly
@agrawalritz As we are unable to amend ticket/ apply for refund on behalf of your travel agent, please approach your travel agent for further assistance - Holly
@agrawalritz Hi Ritesh, as your ticket is booked through a third party, please approach your travel agent for follow-up - Holly
@rpancholia Hi there, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@agrawalritz Hi there, we note that your ticket was issued with a travel agent, unfortunately we are unable to request refund on their behalf. Please contact your travel agent for further assistance. 
-Ella
